div_aria-describedby_aria-hidden_role_st:
The issue in the given code snippet is that the ARIA toggle fields do not have accessible names. To fix this, you can add an `aria-label` attribute that provides a descriptive name for the toggle fields.

Here's the corrected version of the code snippet:

```html
<div aria-describedby="..." aria-hidden="false" role="option" style="width: 900px;" tabindex="-1" aria-label="Descriptive name for the toggle field">
```

Make sure to replace "Descriptive name for the toggle field" with an appropriate name that describes the purpose of the toggle field.
